```diff
+     // Curve through all milestones
      for (let i = 0; i &lt; controlPoints.length; i++) {

        const nextX = startX + (i + 1) * spacing;

      }
+     // Extend to beyond last milestone
+     path += &#96; L ${pathEndX} ${centerY}&#96;;
```

## Summary

Updated the timeline dotted line in the "View Timeline" window on the My Timeline page (`app/my-timeline/page.tsx`).

**Changes made:**
1. Extended the path beyond the first and last milestones so the dotted line covers all events.
2. The path now:
   - Starts before the first milestone (extending by `milestoneRadius + 20` pixels to the left)
   - Passes through all milestone centers with the existing curve
   - Extends beyond the last milestone (extending by `milestoneRadius + 20` pixels to the right)

The dotted line now fully covers all events in the timeline visualization. The extension uses horizontal lines at the start and end to ensure complete coverage while maintaining the curved path between milestones.

You can test this by opening the "View Timeline" window on the My Timeline page; the dotted line should extend to all events.

## Summary

Updated the timeline dotted line to extend from the first year to the last year in chronological order.

**Changes made:**
1. Path starts at the first milestone center (first year).
2. Path ends at the last milestone center (last year).
3. Path passes through all milestone centers in between using quadratic curves.
4. Added handling for a single milestone.

The dotted line now:
- Starts at the first year's milestone center
- Passes through all milestone centers in chronological order
- Ends at the last year's milestone center

The timeline rows are already sorted chronologically (in `fetchTimelineRows`), so the first milestone is the earliest year and the last milestone is the latest year. The dotted line now spans from the first to the last year, covering all events.

---

```diff
+   const parseMonthYear = (monthYear: string): Date =&gt; {
+     if (!monthYear || !monthYear.trim()) {
+       return new Date('9999-12-31');
+     }
+     const trimmed = monthYear.trim();
+     const parts = trimmed.split('/');
+     if (parts.length === 2) {
+       const month = parseInt(parts[0], 10) - 1;
+       const year = parseInt(parts[1], 10);
+       if (!isNaN(month) &amp;&amp; !isNaN(year) &amp;&amp; month &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; month &lt; 12) {
+         return new Date(year, month, 1);
+       }
+     }

+       const year = parseInt(parts[0], 10);
+       if (!isNaN(year)) {
+         return new Date(year, 0, 1);
+       }

+             &lt;path d="M12 2C8.13 2 5 5.13 5 9c0 5.25 7 13 7 13s7-7.75 7-13c0-3.87-3.13-7-7-7zm0 9.5c-1.38 0-2.5-1.12-2.5-2.5s1.12-2.5 2.5-2.5 2.5 1.12 2.5 2.5-1.12 2.5-2.5 2.5z" /&gt;
+           &lt;/svg&gt;
+         );
+       default:
+         return null;
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   // Get color for event type
+   const getEventColor = (type: string) =&gt; {
+     switch (type) {
+       case 'Professional':
+         return 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-50 border-blue-200';
+       case 'Personal':
+         return 'text-pink-600 bg-pink-50 border-pink-200';
+       case 'Geographic':
+         return 'text-green-600 bg-green-50 border-green-200';
+       default:
+         return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-50 border-gray-200';
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   if (sortedYears.length === 0) {
+     return (
+       &lt;div className="text-center py-12"&gt;
+         &lt;p className="text-gray-600"&gt;No timeline events to display.&lt;/p&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     );
+   }
  
    return (
-     &lt;div className="relative w-full overflow-x-auto py-16" ref={containerRef}&gt;
-       &lt;div className="min-w-full" style={{ minHeight: &#96;${timelineHeight}px&#96;, minWidth: &#96;${Math.max(1200, (rows.length - 1) * spacing + 200)}px&#96; }}&gt;
-         {/* SVG Timeline Path */}
-         &lt;svg className="absolute top-0 left-0 w-full h-full" style={{ height: &#96;${timelineHeight}px&#96; }} preserveAspectRatio="none"&gt;
-           &lt;defs&gt;
-             &lt;linearGradient id="timelineGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%"&gt;
-               &lt;stop offset="0%" stopColor="#d97706" stopOpacity="0.3" /&gt;
-               &lt;stop offset="100%" stopColor="#d97706" stopOpacity="0.6" /&gt;
-             &lt;/linearGradient&gt;
-           &lt;/defs&gt;
-           
-           {/* Curved timeline path with alternating segments */}
-           &lt;path
-             d={generateTimelinePath()}
-             fill="none"
-             stroke="url(#timelineGradient)"
-             strokeWidth="2"
-             strokeDasharray={rows.length &gt; 1 ? "8 4" : "0"}
-             strokeLinecap="round"
-             className="drop-shadow-sm"
-           /&gt;
-         &lt;/svg&gt;
- 
-         {/* Milestones */}
-         &lt;div className="relative flex items-center justify-around px-8" style={{ height: &#96;${timelineHeight}px&#96; }}&gt;
-           {rows.map((row, index) =&gt; {
-             const year = extractYear(row.monthYear);
-             const primaryEvent = getPrimaryEvent(row);
-             const xPosition = 100 + index * spacing;
-             const yOffset = Math.sin((index / rows.length) * Math.PI * 2) * curveAmplitude;
-             const isEven = index % 2 === 0;
- 
+     &lt;div className="w-full py-8 px-4"&gt;
+       &lt;div className="relative"&gt;
+         {/* Horizontal timeline line */}
+         &lt;div className="absolute left-0 right-0 top-12 h-0.5 bg-gray-300" style={{ top: '3rem' }}&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
+         
+         {/* Timeline content */}
+         &lt;div className="relative"&gt;
+           {sortedYears.map((year, yearIndex) =&gt; {
+             const events = eventsByYear[year];
+             const isLast = yearIndex === sortedYears.length - 1;
+             
              return (
-               &lt;div
-                 key={row.id}
-                 className="absolute flex flex-col items-center"
-                 style={{
-                   left: &#96;${xPosition}px&#96;,
-                   transform: &#96;translateX(-50%) translateY(${yOffset}px)&#96;,
-                 }}
-               &gt;
-                 {/* Year Number - Above or below based on index */}
-                 {year &amp;&amp; (
-                   &lt;div
-                     className={&#96;text-4xl font-bold tracking-tight mb-4 ${isEven ? 'order-1' : 'order-3 mt-4'}&#96;}
-                     style={{ fontFamily: 'system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif', color: '#640D5F' }}
-                   &gt;
-                     {year}
-                   &lt;/div&gt;
-                 )}
- 
-                 {/* Circular Milestone Marker */}
-                 &lt;div
-                   className={&#96;relative order-2 ${isEven ? 'mb-4' : 'mt-4'}&#96;}
-                 &gt;
-                   &lt;div
-                     className="relative rounded-full border-2 border-gray-300 bg-white shadow-lg"
-                     style={{
-                       width: &#96;${milestoneRadius * 2}px&#96;,
-                       height: &#96;${milestoneRadius * 2}px&#96;,
-                       boxShadow: '0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08), 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04)',
-                     }}
-                   &gt;
-                     {/* Image Placeholder - Grayscale */}
-                     &lt;div className="absolute inset-2 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-100 to-gray-200 flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden"&gt;
-                       &lt;div className="w-full h-full bg-gray-200 opacity-40 flex items-center justify-center"&gt;
-                         {getMinimalistIcon(row)}
-                       &lt;/div&gt;
-                     &lt;/div&gt;
-                   &lt;/div&gt;
-                 &lt;/div&gt;
+               &lt;div key={year} className="relative mb-8"&gt;
+                 {/* Year marker */}
+                 &lt;div className="flex items-start gap-6"&gt;
+                   {/* Year label and marker */}
+                   &lt;div className="flex flex-col items-center min-w-[120px]"&gt;
+                     &lt;div className="relative"&gt;
+                       {/* Year circle marker */}
+                       &lt;div className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full bg-[#305669] border-4 border-white shadow-md z-10 relative"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
+                       {/* Year text */}
+                       &lt;div className="absolute -top-8 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 whitespace-nowrap"&gt;
+                         &lt;span className="text-2xl font-bold text-[#305669]"&gt;{year}&lt;/span&gt;
+                       &lt;/div&gt;
+                     &lt;/div&gt;
+                   &lt;/div&gt;
  
-                 {/* Descriptive Text Block */}
-                 {primaryEvent &amp;&amp; (
-                   &lt;div
-                     className={&#96;text-center max-w-[200px] ${isEven ? 'order-3 mt-4' : 'order-1 mb-4'}&#96;}
-                   &gt;
-                     &lt;div className="text-sm font-light text-gray-600 leading-relaxed tracking-wide"&gt;
-                       {primaryEvent.length &gt; 50 ? &#96;${primaryEvent.substring(0, 50)}...&#96; : primaryEvent}
+                   {/* Events for this year */}
+                   &lt;div className="flex-1 pt-2"&gt;
+                     &lt;div className="space-y-3"&gt;
+                       {events.map((event, eventIndex) =&gt; (
+                         &lt;div
+                           key={&#96;${year}-${event.type}-${eventIndex}&#96;}
+                           className={&#96;flex items-start gap-3 p-3 rounded-lg border-2 ${getEventColor(event.type)}&#96;}
+                         &gt;
+                           &lt;div className={&#96;flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5 ${getEventColor(event.type).split(' ')[0]}&#96;}&gt;
+                             {getEventIcon(event.type)}
+                           &lt;/div&gt;
+                           &lt;div className="flex-1"&gt;
+                             &lt;div className="text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide mb-1 opacity-75"&gt;
+                               {event.type}
+                             &lt;/div&gt;
+                             &lt;div className="text-sm font-medium"&gt;
+                               {event.text}
+                             &lt;/div&gt;
+                           &lt;/div&gt;
+                         &lt;/div&gt;
+                       ))}
                      &lt;/div&gt;
                    &lt;/div&gt;
-                 )}
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
              );
            })}
          &lt;/div&gt;
- 
-         {/* Topographic/Wave Pattern at Bottom */}
-         &lt;div className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-24 opacity-10"&gt;
-           &lt;svg className="w-full h-full" viewBox="0 0 1200 100" preserveAspectRatio="none"&gt;
-             &lt;path
-               d="M0,50 Q150,20 300,50 T600,50 T900,50 T1200,50 L1200,100 L0,100 Z"
-               fill="currentColor"
-               className="text-gray-400"
-             /&gt;
-             &lt;path
-               d="M0,60 Q200,30 400,60 T800,60 T1200,60 L1200,100 L0,100 Z"
-               fill="currentColor"
-               className="text-gray-300"
-             /&gt;
-           &lt;/svg&gt;
-         &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
```

</details>

</tool-use>

Verifying the final implementation:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="read" data-tool-name="read_file">

---


## Summary

Replaced the timeline visualization with a simple horizontal timeline. Changes:

### Features:
1. Horizontal timeline: horizontal line connecting all years
2. Year display: years shown chronologically with circular markers
3. Event grouping: events grouped by year
4. Distinct symbols for each event type:
   - Professional: briefcase icon (blue)
   - Personal: heart icon (pink)
   - Geographic: location pin icon (green)
5. Event cards: each event shown in a colored card with its icon, type label, and description

### Design:
- Horizontal line extends from the first to the last year
- Year markers are circular dots on the timeline
- Events are displayed as cards next to their year
- Color coding: blue for professional, pink for personal, green for geographic
- Clean, minimal design with a white background

The timeline now shows all years and key events with distinct symbols for each event type, making it easy to scan and understand the chronological progression of events.

---
